notes: Our first game in which we pressed with the front four. During the 1st half is worked (to an extent); one of our goals was the result of the press. Halftime score was 3-5 (to them). We tired in the 2nd half & lost our shape. We made a few unforced errors, 2 or 3 of led to goals. Possibly Tom's last game for a while... we're going to miss him!
